meanings: a spokesman for[of] the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
a spokesman for[of] the opposition party
a spokesman for[of] the ruling party

vlive.korean: [그럼 전 77억 인구의 대변인으로서 전합니다 (세븐틴 귀여워)] 가장 시끄러운 멤버는? [I'm the spokesperson of 7.7 billion people] [SVT is so cute!] Who's the loudest one? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SEVENTEEN] 💖나의 좌우명: 세븐틴의 귀여움은 늘 정답이다💙 (SEVENTEEN’s speed Q&A)
vlive.english: [I'm the spokesperson of 7.7 billion people] [SVT is so cute!] Who's the loudest one?

vlive.korean: [강아지 대변인] "강아지:저게 나라고?" [Puppy representative] "Puppy says that's me?" 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] 스키즈배 우당탕탕 미니어처 만들기 대회 (부제: 🐷+🐰=❓) (Stray Kids making miniatures)
[엑소엘 대변인] 이런 거 아닐까요? [Spokesperson for EXO-L] Wouldn't it be something like this? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : 눕방 100회 특집스페셜 '눕방의 역사' (100th Anniversary LieV SPECIAL)
vlive.english: [Spokesperson for EXO-L] Wouldn't it be something like this?

vlive.korean: 알겠습니다 - 싱글 나왔잖아요 또 -잠시만요 혹시 우현 씨 대변인이세요? I got it. - Here is a single album. - Hey, are you a spokesperson? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] INFINITE X CouchTalk - 인피니트 X 카우치토크
vlive.english: I got it. - Here is a single album. - Hey, are you a spokesperson?

vlive.korean: 대변인 느낌은 약간 있습니다. I do feel sort of like a spokesperson. 듣기 View video WINNER : tvN 신서유기 3 제작발표회
vlive.english: I do feel sort of like a spokesperson.

examples.korean: a spokesperson 발음듣기 대변인 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
A spokesman dismissed any suggestion of a boardroom rift. 발음듣기 대변인이 중역실 내의 불화에 대한 어떤 시사도 일축했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A spokesman dismissed any suggestion of a boardroom rift. 발음

examples.korean: This line is being peddled by all the government spokesmen. 발음듣기 이러한 노선이 모든 정부 대변인들에 의해 유포되고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This line is being peddled by all the government spokesmen. 발음

examples.korean: A spokesperson commented that levels of carbon dioxide were very high. 발음듣기 한 대변인이 이산화탄소의 수치가 대단히 높다는 논평을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A spokesperson commented that levels of carbon dioxide were very high. 발음

examples.korean: the Opposition spokesman on education 발음듣기 교육 부문 야당 대변인 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the Opposition spokesman on education 발음
